metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4908 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in PNP4Nagios through 0.6.22 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the URI used for reaching (1) share/pnp/application/views/kohana_error_page.php or (2) share/pnp/application/views/template.php, leading to improper handling within an http-equiv="refresh" META element.

criterions.comment: pnp4nagios: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
